# Grand RP LEO Toolkit - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack Next.js application for Law Enforcement Officers in Grand RP providing bodycam commands, patrolman's guide, and evidence generator.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS (dark theme)
- SheetJS (xlsx) for Excel parsing
- React hooks for state management
